official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the General Crook Trail in Arizona and the Beale Wagon Road in Arizona, for study to determine the feasibility and desirability of their designation as national historical trails.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to designate the General Crook Trail and the Beale Wagon Road in Arizona for consideration for designation as national historic trials.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the General Crook Trail in Arizona and the Beale Wagon Road in Arizona, for study to determine the feasibility and desirability of their designation as national historical trails.
